data.caption: Results-Audited Financial Results (Standalone And Consolidated) For The Quarter And Year Ended March 31, 2023
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors in their Meeting held on Thursday, May 18, 2023, has duly approved the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2023, the Statement of Assets and Liabilities as at March 31, 2023, the Statement of Cash Flow as at March 31, 2023 and the Independent Auditors' Report with modified opinion on Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter and year ended on March 31, 2023. The copy of the same is enclosed herewith.

The Board meeting commenced at 12:15 P.M. and concluded at 03:15 P.M.

data.caption: Unaudited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended December 31, 2022.
data.news_body:
We wish to inform that the meeting of Board of Directors of the Company was held today i.e. Thursday, February 09, 2023 at 04.15 p.m. and the Board has inter-alia approved the following:

1. Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we enclose the following:

a. Statement showing the Unaudited Standalone Financial Results for the Quarter and Nine Months ended December 31, 2022.
b. Statement showing the Unaudited Consolidated Financial Results for the Quarter and Nine Months ended December 31, 2022.
c. Limited Review Report of our Auditors, M/s A. Sachdev & Co., Chartered Accountants in respect of the said financial results.

2. Mr. Rahul Rawat (ACS: 27891) has been appointed as Company Secretary & Compliance Officer of the company w.e.f. 14th February, 2023 pursuant to Section 203 of the Companies Act 2013 and Regulation 6(1) of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015.

The aforesaid meeting was concluded at 06:00 P.M.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Unaudited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended December 31, 2022
data.news_body:
We wish to inform that the meeting of Board of Directors of the Company was held today i.e. Thursday, February 09, 2023 at 04.15 p.m. and the Board has inter-alia approved the following:

1. Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we enclose the following:

a. Statement showing the Unaudited Standalone Financial Results for the Quarter and Nine Months ended December 31, 2022.
b. Statement showing the Unaudited Consolidated Financial Results for the Quarter and Nine Months ended December 31, 2022.
c. Limited Review Report of our Auditors, M/s A. Sachdev & Co., Chartered Accountants in respect of the said financial results.

2. Mr. Rahul Rawat (ACS: 27891) has been appointed as Company Secretary & Compliance Officer of the company w.e.f. 14th February, 2023 pursuant to Section 203 of the Companies Act 2013 and Regulation 6(1) of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015.

The aforesaid meeting was concluded at 06:00 P.M.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Under Regulation 30 And 33 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.
data.news_body:
The outcome of the said meeting is as given hereunder:
1. Approval of Standalone and Consolidated Audited Financial Results for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2022:
The Board of Directors have considered and approved the Standalone and Consolidated Audited Financial Results for the Quarter & year ended 31st March, 2022.
2. Audit Report for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2022: The Board considered and approved the Independent Audit Report, on the Standalone & Consolidated Financial Statements of the Company, by M/s M.H. Dalal & Associates, Chartered Accountants Statutory Auditors of the Company for the financial year ended 31st March, 2022.
3. Statements on Impact of Audit Qualification for Audit Report with Modified Opinion: Pursuant to Regulation 33(3)(d) of the Listing Regulations, 2015, Statements on Impact of Audit Qualification (Standalone & Consolidated) for Audit Report with Modified Opinion for the Financial Year ended 31st March, 2022, are enclosed

data.caption: Standalone And Consolidated Audited Financial Results For The Quarter & Year Ended 31St March, 2022
data.news_body:

1. Approval of Standalone and Consolidated Audited Financial Results for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2022:The Board of Directors have considered and approved the Standalone and Consolidated Audited Financial Results for the Quarter & year ended 31st March, 2022.
2. Audit Report for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2022: The Board considered and approved the Independent Audit Report, on the Standalone & Consolidated Financial Statements of the Company, by M/s M.H. Dalal & Associates, Chartered Accountants Statutory Auditors of the Company for the financial year ended 31st March, 2022.
3. Statements on Impact of Audit Qualification for Audit Report with Modified Opinion: Pursuant to Regulation 33(3)(d) of the Listing Regulations, 2015, Statements on Impact of Audit Qualification (Standalone & Consolidated) for Audit Report with Modified Opinion for the Financial Year ended 31st March, 2022, are enclosed.
